name: BlockMill
summary: BlockMill is packed with fun missions and challenges that reward you with upgrades, alternatively, skip ahead and buy items that enable you to customize your buildings in ways you never thought possible.. Want to make your home higher than a skyscraper or add a picture of your beloved pet to the roof, or how about snagging a rival sports stadium for your own personal use? The sky really is the limit!! If you want to switch up, you can trade buildings with other players, or even gift buildings to friends and family.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: BlockMill is coming soon, sign up now.
